Hello! This is ZinCin!

I am glad to welcome you to my site! Now I will briefly tell you about myself.

About Me

I am a python, and part-time turbo and js developer! You can see my projects in the projects tab, and also visit my social networks. I specialize in telegram bots on python, sites on js and other projects on turbo.

Fun Fact

By the way, my nickname contains Zinc (from Latin Zincum) - a chemical element of the 12th group with an atomic number of 30!
